guidanceItem.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan
guidanceItem.title: Access to the Metabase.bin File Is Audited
guidanceItem.content:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that access to the metabase.bin file is audited.


How to Fix

Audit all failures by the Everyone group to the IIS metabase.bin file located in \WINNT\System32\inetsrv\. Do the same for the \Metabase backup folder for the backup copies of the metabase.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
